did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Dutch Reformed Church of Owasco records, 1798-1870.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Dutch Reformed Church of Owasco (Owasco, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Membership lists and minutes of the Consistory for the Dutch Reformed Church of Owasco and the Sand Beach Dutch Reformed Church. Minutes of the Consistory and subscription lists of the Dutch Reformed Church of Owasco (Owasco Outlet Church). Tithing list, minutes of the Consistory, list of baptisms, articles of association, and subscription lists.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One volume contains membership lists and minutes of the Consistory for the Dutch Reformed Church of Owasco and the Sand Beach Dutch Reformed Church, 1798-1835. One volume contains minutes of the Consistory and subscription lists of the Dutch Reformed Church of Owasco (Owasco Outlet Church), 1798-1860. One volume contains the tithing list, 1810-1815. One volume contains minutes of the Consistory, 1860-1870. Other records are a list of baptisms, 1799-1801, articles of association, 1810 and subscription lists, 1826.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
